messages.message:
Sr. Developer - PHP

Dear Brian, 

I found your profile on LinkedIn today and wanted to check and see if you are still interested in opportunities. I have a client that is asking me to find a PHP Developer and I'd like to discuss it with you if possible. Also, I noticed that you did a Raspberry Pi project and I'm very interested in picking your brain about that if I could. I have another client that is talking to us about a need for a Pi professional and to be honest with you, it is not a technology that I am overly familiar with. I've been recruiting a long time but haven't had anyone ask for this before. So, it would be interesting to chat with you.

Thank you for your time and I look forward to your response.

Donna Johnson
Solu Technology Partners
Scottsdale, AZ
602-723-1120 | djohnson@solutechnology.com
Raspberry pi is awesome, it's a microcontroller. Kind of like your cell phone without the nice screen and an engineer can plug anything in to it.
thank you regarding PI!....hey, I am attaching this job description on the PHP need...if you know of anyone looking or would be interested, let me know. It's direct hire, not contract....
